hooks.prompt: Check if the file being written contains any hardcoded secrets, API keys, passwords, or tokens (anything matching patterns like sk-*, AIza*, ghp_*, xoxb-*, or generic password/secret assignments). If secrets are found, respond with BLOCK and explain which secret was detected. If no secrets found, respond with ALLOW. Input: $ARGUMENTS

hooks.command: exit_code=$(echo "$TOOL_RESULT" | jq -r '.exitCode // 0'); if [ "$exit_code" != "0" ]; then echo '[hook] Command exited with non-zero status'; fi
